title: Zwirn on Distressed Investing, Rabil Talks Sports
itunes:title: Zwirn on Distressed Investing, Rabil Talks Sports
description:
Daniel Zwirn, Chief Executive Officer at Arena Investors, discusses the credit market and distressed investing in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak. Premier Lacrosse League Co-Founder Paul Rabil explains how the sports world is dealing with league suspension as a result of the outbreak.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
